mapper.select: SELECT s.profile_info AS sellerProfile FROM store st JOIN seller s ON st.seller_id = s.seller_id WHERE st.store_url = #{storeUrl}

SELECT st.store_name AS storeName, m.member_name AS sellerName, s.account AS accountNumber, s.account_bank AS accountBank, m.member_name AS accountHolder, SUM(od.order_cnt * od.order_price) AS adjustmentAmount, '정산 예정' AS adjustmentStatus, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(oi.order_date, 'MM'), 1), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS adjustmentDate FROM order_info oi JOIN order_detail od ON oi.order_id = od.order_id JOIN product p ON od.product_id = p.product_id JOIN store st ON p.store_id = st.store_id JOIN seller s ON st.seller_id = s.seller_id JOIN member m ON s.member_id = m.member_id WHERE s.personal_check = 0 AND oi.order_date >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') AND oi.order_date < ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), 1) GROUP BY st.store_name, m.member_name, s.account, s.account_bank, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(oi.order_date, 'MM'), 1), 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY adjustmentAmount DESC

SELECT m.member_name AS sellerName, s.account AS accountNumber, s.account_bank AS accountBank, m.member_name AS accountHolder, SUM(od.order_cnt * od.order_price) AS adjustmentAmount, '정산 예정' AS adjustmentStatus, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(oi.order_date, 'MM'), 1), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS adjustmentDate FROM order_info oi JOIN order_detail od ON oi.order_id = od.order_id JOIN product p ON od.product_id = p.product_id JOIN store st ON p.store_id = st.store_id JOIN seller s ON st.seller_id = s.seller_id JOIN member m ON s.member_id = m.member_id WHERE s.personal_check = 0 AND oi.order_date >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') AND oi.order_date < ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), 1) GROUP BY m.member_name, s.account, s.account_bank, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(oi.order_date, 'MM'), 1), 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY adjustmentAmount DESC

SELECT s.account AS accountNumber, s.account_bank AS bankName, p.product_name, TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(p.product_detail, 1, 4000)) AS productDetail, SUM(od.order_cnt * p.price) AS totalSales, SUM(CASE WHEN d.delivery_check = 2 THEN od.order_cnt * p.price ELSE 0 END) AS deliveredSales, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), 1), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS adjustmentDate, '정산 예정' AS adjustmentStatus FROM order_info oi JOIN order_detail od ON oi.order_id = od.order_id JOIN product p ON od.product_id = p.product_id JOIN store st ON p.store_id = st.store_id JOIN seller s ON st.seller_id = s.seller_id LEFT JOIN delivery d ON oi.order_id = d.order_id WHERE s.personal_check = 1 AND oi.order_date >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') AND oi.order_date < ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), 1) AND s.member_id = #{memberId} GROUP BY s.account, s.account_bank, p.product_name, TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(p.product_detail, 1, 4000)) ORDER BY SUM(od.order_cnt * p.price) DESC

SELECT TO_CHAR(oi.order_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS saleDate, SUM(od.order_cnt * p.price) AS dailyTotal, p.product_name FROM order_info oi JOIN order_detail od ON oi.order_id = od.order_id JOIN product p ON od.product_id = p.product_id JOIN store st ON p.store_id = st.store_id JOIN seller s ON st.seller_id = s.seller_id WHERE s.personal_check = 1 AND oi.order_date >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 7 AND s.member_id = #{memberId} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(oi.order_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), p.product_name ORDER BY saleDate

SELECT TO_CHAR(oi.order_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS saleDate, SUM(od.order_cnt * p.price) AS dailyTotal, p.product_name FROM order_info oi JOIN order_detail od ON oi.order_id = od.order_id JOIN product p ON od.product_id = p.product_id JOIN store st ON p.store_id = st.store_id JOIN seller s ON st.seller_id = s.seller_id WHERE oi.order_date >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 7 AND st.store_url = #{storeUrl} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(oi.order_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), p.product_name ORDER BY saleDate

SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, SUM(od.order_cnt * p.price) AS totalSales, SUM(CASE WHEN d.delivery_check = 2 THEN od.order_cnt * p.price ELSE 0 END) AS deliveredSales, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), 1), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS adjustmentDate, '정산 예정' AS adjustmentStatus, m.member_name AS sellerName, s.account AS accountNumber, s.account_bank AS bankName, m.member_name AS accountHolder FROM order_info oi JOIN order_detail od ON oi.order_id = od.order_id JOIN product p ON od.product_id = p.product_id JOIN store st ON p.store_id = st.store_id JOIN seller s ON st.seller_id = s.seller_id JOIN member m ON s.member_id = m.member_id LEFT JOIN delivery d ON oi.order_id = d.order_id WHERE oi.order_date >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') AND oi.order_date < ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), 1) AND st.store_url = #{storeUrl} GROUP BY p.product_id, p.product_name, m.member_name, s.account, s.account_bank ORDER BY totalSales DESC
